channel.title: Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature Film
channel.description:
**Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature Film**
Darren was so sad that my last offering was new players only that I set up another 2-session feature so he could play, but we need 3 other lucky (plucky?) players to join us for Romantic Wuxia melodrama!
This is a 2-session 'feature film', so please sign up during the first week only if you can make a good-faith effort to attend both session. If seats are still available when Open Signup comes, you may sign up for single sessions.
The self-styled Emperor of Bandits has died under mysterious circumstances, and now every unsavory character with a band of thugs and will to power is converging on your province to take control of the Leopard Throne.
Session 1 of 2: [date=2019-09-04 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMnLE_XPA0x_PZKXie Session 2 of 2: [date=2019-09-11 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMnamKmqTovBjTcE8f

item.title: Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature Film
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature Film

Darren was so sad that my last offering was new players only that I set up another 2-session feature so he could play, but we need 3 other lucky (plucky?) players to join us for Romantic Wuxia melodrama!

This is a 2-session ‘feature film’, so please sign up during the first week only if you can make a good-faith effort to attend both session. If seats are still available when Open Signup comes, you may sign up for single sessions.

The self-styled Emperor of Bandits has died under mysterious circumstances, and now every unsavory character with a band of thugs and will to power is converging on your province to take control of the Leopard Throne.

Session 1 of 2: 2019-09-05T00:00:00Z: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMnLE_XPA0x_PZKXie
Session 2 of 2: 2019-09-12T00:00:00Z: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMnamKmqTovBjTcE8f
